1.content: You slowly wake up in a strange room. You seem to be restrained to what feels like a reclining chair, with your ankles bound to the footrest and your wrists bound above you. You still feel a little groggy, so you take the moment to think things through. You're in a dark room with a single light source shining down on you... oh, wait, what are you?
1.title: Test begins now

11.content: You remember that you're a Grovyle. As you come back to your senses, the severity of the situation hits you. You're trapped to have who-knows-what done to you! You don't have long to think about it, as you see a mechanical arm descend from the dark ceiling, having a feather attached to the end. You gulp nervously, eyeing that intimidating feather. You're going to be tickled! Your ticklish areas are completely exposed with no hope of defending them! The feather slowly approaches your...
11.title: Grovyle

choices: Feet again, but with different tools"
115.content:
As the feather moves towards your left foot, you close your eyes in anticipation. After a few seconds which feel like hours, you feel its light touch on your sole, followed by a light up-and down stroking from the ball of your foot to the heel making your leg twitch a little. The feather is too soft and light to cause a real tickling sensation, however, so you manage to stifle your giggles with little effort.

After a minute, the feather moves slightly upwards, pointing it at your toes. Itthen starts moving from side to side. The sensation is quite a bit stronger than before,and you start squirming and wiggling in your restraints.

A mechanical whirring draws your attention to a second mechanical arm which descends towards your other foot. This arm also has a feather attached to it. The second feather goes straight towards your toes. The combined tickling on both your feet is finally too much, and a giggle escapes your mouth, although you manage to stop the flow of laughs. After enduring three minutes of toe tickling, the arms retract into the ceiling. You sigh in relief; maybe this ordeal is finally over!

Suddenly, the lights turn on and you spot a female human wearing a lab coat sitting at a console behind a window. You observe your surroundings: they are white and sterile like a lab, and a large silver colored disc is suspended over you. This device seems to be the source of the tickling arms that were torturing you just then.

The woman grabs a microphone and her voice rings from speakers spread around the room's ceiling:

"This was just the first test of many. We are researching sensitivity to tickling in Pokemon and we have many experiments to run. We hope you are enjoying this as much as I am!"

Enjoying this? That was just light feather tickling and it was awful! You start sweating in dread of what's to come...

The woman starts talking again:
"For our next test, we will be tickling your...
115.title: Feather on foot

1152.content:
"We will be tickling your feet again. However, we will be using different tools to see how you react to each of them. First up, robot hands."

Two arms with gloved hands on their tips come out of the silver disc hanging over you. They each grab a foot and start massaging it. It tickles slightly, but feels good! After two minutes of massage, they start scratching your sole with their index finger, which causes you to tense up an cry out in surprise. This tickles WAY more than just feathers! You don't know how much longer you can take this!

Two minutes later, the scratching stops and they instead spider-tickle your entire foot. You finally burst with laughter. Each touch is unbearable! You just want this to be over. The spider tickling last five minutes, but after a one minute break, the hands go back into the disc and are promptly replaced by two spinning brushes! This is the most intense tickling you have ever felt! You scream in ticklish agony. After a long while, the brushes retract, leaving you panting and still slightly giggling even though the tickling is over for now.

The woman speaks up once more:
"These results are very interesting. We will be running more tests tomorrow, but you must be exhausted right now, so we are sending you to your room to recuperate."

The chair you are tied to starts moving on a rail in the ground through a long corridor full of doors. Finally, it stops in front of a door which opens automatically. Once inside, the restraints open themselves, leaving you in a comfortable-looking enclosure made to look like a jungle. There is some rather tasty food and a soft mattress, so after eating you quickly fall asleep.

When you wake up the next day, you are already restrained in the chair. The same woman from yesterday starts talking.

"Today, we will be tickling your...
1152.title: Feet again, but with different tools"

11522.content:
Still feeling a bit tired, you shrug off what the woman says. Though when you finally wake up, you shudder at the sight of two buffer-like brushes emerging from the disc above you. They start to rotate slowly, filling you with dread. The buffers gradually pick up speed, until they are rapidly spinning and closing in on your armpits.

You take a deep breath and brace yourself, but they don't seem to be making contact. Rather, they're staying at their positions. You quickly exhale, and that's when the buffers strike your vulnerable pits.

You erupt with laughter as the brushes swiftly drill into your underarms. To make the matters worse, your arms are being stretched high above your head, leaving you with no method of defense and allowing the bristles to access the entire area of your armpits. The brushes then start to tickle...
11522.title: Underarms

choices: Second though want to be a different Pokemon
12.content:
To quote a great man (terrible grandfather)

ARE
YOU
A
BOY
OR
A
GIRL
12.title: Charmeleon

choices: I still want a different Pokemon
155.content: Man, you're picky, aren't you? Oh well, here are some more choices.
155.title: Next Choices

1551.content:
That’s right, you’re a Gardevoir! And not a bad looking one at that, too!

Just then, you hear footsteps walking into the room as a somewhat tall woman scientist enters the room. She is wearing a white lab-coat, has blonde hair (tied in a ponytail) and thin glasses, a rather slim figure and C-cup breasts.

“Ah, here’s our little test subject. How are you feeling today?” She gives you a warm smile, walking towards a closet and pulling out a small drawer with wheels.

“So, we at this laboratory are doing a little experiment on the sensitivity of Pokémon, and since we found no willing participants of your species, we decided to capture one at random. Don’t worry, we’ll let you go eventually, we just need to thoroughly subject different parts of your body to certain kinds of stimulation and record your reactions. We won’t hurt you, so you’re not in any danger.” She seemed nice, and you were able to relax a bit knowing that everything would be fine.

“Let’s get started, shall we?” She says, before walking up to you and skittering her fingers along your...
1551.title: Gardevoir

choices: She switches to tickle your butt
She grabs a tool to tickle your boobs with
15511.content:
The scientist starts skittering her fingers quickly along the tops of your rather large breasts, eliciting loud laughter from you.

“G-GAHAHAHAHAHAHARDEHEHEVOIHIHIRAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!” You scream with laughter as the scientist continues, moving to the bottoms of your breasts.

“Alright, it looks like you’re quite ticklish here...” she smirks slightly as she speeds up, causing you to laugh even louder. Then...
15511.title: Breast tickles

info.brief_description: You are a PokÃ©mon who is put through many ticklish tests.
info.description:
Rules:
- Other methods can include hypnosis, psychic tickling, tickle "workouts", and so on so forth.
- Nothing too adult. No 'parts'.
- The PokÃ©mon cannot die or be killed in your chapters.
- The ticklers are human lab scientists, sometimes aided by technological PokÃ©mon such as Magnemite or Klang.
- No humanxPokÃ©mon anything.
- Try not to have your entries be small. Put at least 5 sentences in your chapter to keep it interesting.
- Have fun!

I do not own PokÃ©mon in any way.
